title: NBA Play-In Reaction
description:
Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon talk Luka Dončić's Health, James Harden’s fit, Gabe Kapler’s defiance of the unwritten rules of Baseball and the NBA Play-In games so far. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: PTI: Gabe Kapler's defiance and reaction to the NBA Play-In so far
